clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 40 mm in diameter.
Collapse of left lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
